faqs.question: What is the purpose of this chatbot?
faqs.answer: This chatbot is designed to answer frequently asked questions and help users find information quickly.

faqs.question: How do I start using the chatbot?
faqs.answer: You can start by typing your question in the chat box and pressing Enter. The bot will try to provide the most relevant answer.

faqs.question: Is my data safe while using this chatbot?
faqs.answer: Yes, this chatbot does not store personal data permanently. All interactions are temporary and used only to generate responses.

faqs.question: What kind of questions can I ask?
faqs.answer: You can ask general questions related to the topic or product for which the chatbot has FAQs. For unrelated questions, the bot may not have an answer.

faqs.question: How accurate are the chatbot's answers?
faqs.answer: The answers are based on the stored FAQ dataset. They are accurate for the provided questions but may not cover all possible scenarios.

faqs.question: Can I ask multiple questions in a row?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can type multiple questions one after another. The chatbot will try to answer each question individually.

faqs.question: Does the chatbot work on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, the chatbot interface is web-based and can be accessed from desktop, tablet, or mobile devices.

faqs.question: What should I do if the chatbot does not understand my question?
faqs.answer: Try rephrasing your question in simpler words or check the FAQ list for similar questions.

faqs.question: Can I see a list of all FAQs?
faqs.answer: Currently, the chatbot shows answers based on your question. You may ask it to provide a full FAQ list if programmed to do so.

faqs.question: How do I provide feedback on the chatbot?
faqs.answer: Feedback can be sent through the feedback option in the chat interface or via email to the project administrator.

faqs.question: Can I use this chatbot for learning purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, this chatbot can be used to practice asking questions, learn basic AI concepts, or explore FAQ automation.

faqs.question: Is an internet connection required to use the chatbot?
faqs.answer: Yes, a working internet connection is required to communicate with the backend server and retrieve answers.

faqs.question: How frequently is the FAQ data updated?
faqs.answer: The FAQ data can be updated manually by the admin whenever new questions and answers are added.

faqs.question: Can I integrate this chatbot into my website?
faqs.answer: Yes, the chatbot can be integrated into other websites by embedding the frontend code and connecting it to the backend server.

faqs.question: Who can I contact for technical support?
faqs.answer: For technical support, contact the project supervisor or the IT support team listed in the project documentation.
